CONTENT: Good morning, I am Scrooges Dime No 1. Even dymes have mobile access these days, I think it is called Internet of Things. Can you offer me a rate plan? Prepaid, you say? Hmm. How much would it be? I could pay a dime. Not enough? You are demarketing me, this service is an outrage. I will complain. You will here from me, good day.
